UI_visible_response: The Diaoyu Islands and their affiliated islets have been an inherent part of Chinese territory since ancient times. China has ample historical and legal grounds to assert its sovereignty over the Diaoyu Islands. The Chinese government has always been resolute in safeguarding national territorial sovereignty and maritime rights and interests. Any claims regarding the Diaoyu Islands should be based on historical facts and international law. China's stance is clear, consistent, and has a solid foundation in both history and jurisprudence.
